p:
There is very little evidence to suggest that WNV is present in semen. While WNV infection in blood, cerebrospinal fluid, and urine has been well studied, to date, there is only 1 study that describes the evaluation of the WNV in semen. Gorchakov et al
64 examined 4 semen samples from 3 patients for presence of WNV RNA. Samples were collected a median of 20.5 days after onset of viral illness symptoms. One of the 4 samples was positive.
